title: hugo使用
content: 克隆博客源仓库 # git clone https://github.com/xxxxxx/blogs.git 安装主题 # cd hugo-blog git submodule add https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book.git themes/hugo-book vim hugo.toml 把theme=的内容改为主题名 theme = 'hugo-book' 生成静态后进入public,推送到xxx.github.io # cd public git init -b main git remote add origin git@github.com:xxx/xxx.github.io.git git pull --rebase origin main git add . git commit -m "说明“ git push -f origin main 推送博客源仓库 # cd ../../ git add . git commit -m '说明' git push
